segments.text: I see the kitchen is quite bright today.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink seems deeply focused on her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's meticulously polishing that plate, I notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the water! It's gushing from the faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is completely overflowing, I can clearly see.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A steady stream is pouring over the front edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now there's a significant puddle forming on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is right in it, yet she doesn't react at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's astonishing how completely unaware she is of the rising water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn't she feel the cold splash around her ankle?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is going to cause a lot of damage, I fear.
segments.speaker: PAR
